user_query: I now own Mainland Bank and we intend to change the bank's policies regarding loans thanks to you a loan bought two new piece of equipment doubled our revenue in three months you knew I was going to start signing off on loans directly to jump start things I haven't seen that many viable applicants in one week since I've worked at this bank where are you finding all these people we're casting a wide net um Florence discovered black loans he's been worrying me from the beginning now he's watching me like a hawk any reason why yeah he had dreams of being the boss not reporting to some guy from California 10 years younger than him you started with them you said they were going to make you a partner yeah and a partner isn't on a salary a partner's an owner isn't that what you always told me you wanted to be and I will be on the next bank we buy what you must be Bernard Garrett you're Joe Morris would you follow me here just trying to understand who really owns my bank you boys are famous that's you and Vice President Johnson if I'm not mistaken images but if this town found out that not only was their bank regularly making loans it was actually owned by two of them there'd be a run on the bank the boys think you're so smart oh we are we're a couple colored boys you couldn't just make a loan here there to your kind you had to make 19 of them right off the bat they're moving our yearly inspection up two quarters that's a month from now because of anonymous reports we're making
